name: Fallen London: Fading to a Coda
storyline: A notorious bar-room singer has made a surprise return to London. The Growling Radical makes dangerous enemies everywhere he goes – his latest exile was supposed to be his last. What has drawn him back to the Fifth City? Why has he fixed his eye on a Master of the Bazaar?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for October, 2020.
